publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-964.1 Jeremy Purvis: Graduate Endowment Abolition (Scotland) Billâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-964) in the name of Fiona Hyslop, insert at end "and, in so doing, calls for a statutory duty on Scottish Ministers to provide student support and provision made thereunder to be improved for existing and future students and further calls for more research into the barriers to accessing further and higher education to be undertaken."
